forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain, heavy at times. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Locally heavier rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: A wind driven heavy rain. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Locally heavier rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly overnight. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and thunderstorms. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low around 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 36F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High near 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 60F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
